categories.description: This section gathers context to allow your team to write good requirements
categories.name: Background

fields.label: Context for the project
fields.description: Why are you doing this project? What problem are you solving? What's the organizational context?

categories.description: This section defines what this project will achieve. The goal is to align stakeholders before development work begins.
categories.name: Requirements

fields.label: How the project outputs will be used
Sketch of final product
fields.description: A napkin scribble will do! Even if the outcome is not visual, try to draw what will happen. The purpose of this is to make the real-world outcome concrete just in case the words are unclear.

fields.label: Definition of done
fields.description: For this version, what will you deliver? What specific capabilities will be present

categories.description: This section ensures that present and future technical collaborators can locate project assets and dependencies
categories.name: Technical Details
